category.name: Rich Client
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: GnChangeNoticeRevision_Mdl0ConditionalElement_default_relation
preference.preference_description: Specifies the relation to be created when a 4GD Model Conditional Element is pasted under a Change Notice Revision. The specified relation becomes the default relation created between a 4GD Model Conditional Element and the target Change Notice Revision. Valid values are CMHasProblemItem, CMHasImpactedItem, CMHasSolutionItem, and CMReferences. The default value is "CMHasProblemItem".
